workflow.name: Cisco Secure Email - Extortion OCR image investigation
workflow.title: Cisco Secure Email - Extortion OCR image investigation

properties.name: SMTP Target Name
properties.description: Name of your STMP target in Orchestration

properties.name: inbox_azure_account
properties.description: O365 inbox for where you received your notification email from CES

properties.value: password, paid, adult, porn, PORNO, payment, bitcoin, Bitcoin, Bitcoins, bitcoins, BitCoins, BTC, btc, police, Police, video, proff, masterbation, DDoS, DDOS, ddos
properties.name: dictionary

properties.description:
This workflow monitors a SecureX mailbox for incoming email with unknown language and an image detected by Cisco Secure Email. When the copy of the email is received, the workflow extract the base64 image and send it to Microsoft OCR API service. A dictionary is use to identity if the text could be link to a extortion email. If so a suspicious judgment will be set for Observables from the email. SecureX Casebook will be create with all details.

Target Group: Default TargetGroup 
Target Type : HTTP Endpoint, SMTP Endpoint

Targets: CTR_For_Access_Token, Private_CTIA_Target, Azure_For_Access_Token,  Azure_Graph_API
Variables to be modifed : azure_ocr_api_url, azure_ocr_api_key, inbox_azure_account, notification_email_address, 
For more information : aargeris@cisco.com
properties.display_name: Cisco Secure Email - Extortion OCR image investigation

properties.script:
import sys
from datetime import datetime
import time

linux_time = int(time.time()) 

t =  int(linux_time)
timeISO = (datetime.fromtimestamp(t).isoformat())+'+00:00'

delta = 86400 * $workflow.definition_workflow_01O48TZL26KVM5V6kvn5GgnmcCtKmzMdbRD.local.variable_workflow_01OCO2Q9075QA5XuV2SV9rBDghAYhPdlS5h$
linux_time = int(time.time()) + delta

t =  int(linux_time)
end_time = (datetime.fromtimestamp(t).isoformat())+'.000Z'

Hello!

The email you received with the subject "$workflow.definition_workflow_01O48TZL26KVM5V6kvn5GgnmcCtKmzMdbRD.local.variable_workflow_01O48TZKUCE4G2zwLfi2RVm3L21kIqNxzTG$" is currently analyzed.

properties.script:
words_found = ''
words_count = 0
dic = $workflow.definition_workflow_01O48TZL26KVM5V6kvn5GgnmcCtKmzMdbRD.local.variable_workflow_01OA9K0418N8K2qaYFoQiNj2BOYRg6xwyUq$
text = "$activity.definition_activity_0244C7450H7XP52Ty8b18PGQbQxZkJb8A37.output.variable_workflow_01NV3VHI8VXF27goohSaOCWLs4A966johdm$"
for word in dic:
    if word in  text:
        words_found = words_found + word
        words_count = words_count + 1
